divs: Sighting DetailsI slowed down to witness the metalic colored craft, it seems to roll back & Fourth it looked to have equipment tubes and box type equipment on to top side of the craft below to line of the craft it had port holes of windows And the craft had no sound what so ever I got of a glimence of The occupancy throught the portholes. they were right under to the edge if to top edge Portholes they looked of a old submarine ship I KEPT DRINING TOO MY FREINDS HOW THAT WE HAD PLANS TO WATCH A MOVIE. WHEN WE ARRIVED HE SAID WHERE HAVE YOU GUYs BEEN, MY BROTHER AND I JUST LOOKED AT EACHOTHER, OUY FREIND said he has been waiting fo two and half to over three HRS HRS...This Distance To my buddies house is 15-18 minute ride My brother and I have missing time we can not account for we don'tknow what happined
